definition: To have a strong desire or intention to do something, often expressing a personal preference or expressing a future action. It is commonly used to indicate a person's will, wish, or want for a specific outcome or goal.

examples.english: I want to eat an ice cream.
He wants to go to the cinema.

examples.german: Wir wollen n√§chstes Jahr nach Deutschland reisen.
examples.english: We want to travel to Germany next year.
She wants to read a book.
